allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete time tracking application

Features:
- User authentication \(register, login, password reset\)
- Project management with Owner/Member roles
- One-click timer with browser tab title updates
- Manual time entry support
- Task management within projects
- Team invitations
- Reports with pie/bar charts and CSV export
- Dark/light theme toggle
- Mobile-responsive design

Tech stack:
- Next.js 16 with App Router
- PostgreSQL \(Neon\) with Prisma ORM
- NextAuth.js v5 for authentication
- Tailwind CSS v4
- Recharts for visualizations
- Radix UI components

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add manual time entry feature

- Add /api/time-entries/manual endpoint for creating entries with duration
- Add "Add Time Entry" button to dashboard with dialog
- Users can specify project, description, date, and duration \(hours/minutes\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
